actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

Unfavorable Executive Comment Received From State.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on International Security and Scientific Affairs
Subcommittee on Europe and the Middle East

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that military assistance for the Government of Turkey should be suspended until that nation has taken all necessary and appropriate steps to secure the reversal of the illegal action declaring the independent Turkish Republic of North Cyprus and to promote the full political and economic unity of the Republic of Cyprus.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that military assistance to Turkey should be suspended until Turkey has taken steps to reverse the action declaring the independent Turkish Republic of North Cyprus and to promote the unity of the Republic of Cyprus.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that military assistance for the Government of Turkey should be suspended until that nation has taken all necessary and appropriate steps to secure the reversal of the illegal action declaring the independent Turkish Republic of North Cyprus and to promote the full political and economic unity of the Republic of Cyprus.
